pure interface of class zeta.format.impl.CompoundFormat

The documentated page. 
public abstract class CompoundFormat
  extends NestedFormat
{
    public Format[] formats;
    public int maxWidth;
    public int minWidth;
    public int maxLastWidth;
    public int minLastWidth;
    public int minHeight;
    public int maxWidth();
    public int minWidth();
    public int minHeight();
    public int maxLastWidth();
    public int minLastWidth();
    public CompoundFormat(int indentation,
                          Format[] formats);
    public CompoundFormat(Format[] formats);
    public CompoundFormat(int indentation,
                          String text,
                          String delimiters);
    public CompoundFormat(int indentation,
                          String text);
    public CompoundFormat(String text);
    protected abstract int computeMaxWidth();
    protected abstract int computeMaxLastWidth();
    protected abstract int computeMinHeight();
    protected int computeMinWidth();
    protected int computeMinLastWidth();
    public int appendText(int indentation,
                          FormatStream stream);
    public TextRectangle printTextBeside(int indentation,
                                         FormatStream stream,
                                         int width,
                                         int lastWidth);
    public void dumpText(PrintWriter writer);
}
